channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump: Europe will ‘take a lot of the burden’ in providing security guarantees for Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump meets with Zelenskyy and European leaders to discuss Ukraine security guarantees and potential peace agreement.

item.title: Trump says ceasefire not necessary for peace during high-stakes meeting with Zelenskyy
item.description: President Donald Trump said during a meeting with President Volodomyr Zelenskyy that a ceasefire is not necessary to end the Russia–Ukraine war, citin...

item.title: Potential Pelosi successor re-ups bill to ban ICE from obscuring identities: ‘Shut this mask s--t down’
item.description: California Sen. Scott Wiener calls ICE agents 'Trump's thugs' after enforcement during redistricting event, proposes misdemeanor charges for masked po...

item.title: The Persecution of the Little Sisters of the Poor
item.description: The relentless litigation targeting a Catholic order of nuns is deeply alarming.

item.title: Trump predicts Ukraine security agreement with European allies
item.description: President Trump predicted Monday that the U.S. and European allies would likely reach an agreement on a security guarantee for Ukraine during their Wh...

item.title: Bolivia Is Fed Up with Socialism
item.description: Both presidential candidates who advanced to the runoff promise to undo two decades of leftism.

item.title: Emotional Teenage Girl James Comey Speaks In Taylor Swift Lyrics In Unhinged Anti-Trump Screed
item.description: From here on, pay no attention to Comey, unless he says something of substance (he won't) and backs it up with authenticated documents.

item.title: Newsmax avoids trial with $67 million settlement over false 2020 election claims
item.description: Newsmax claimed its coverage was "fair, balanced, and conducted within professional standards of journalism," even though a judge ruled it had defamed...

item.title: Kumail Nanjiani says Elon Musk did not like HBO’s ‘Silicon Valley’: ‘He was like, all the parties I go to are much cooler than these parties’
item.description: In 2018, Musk vigorously denied he had attended a “sex party,” saying he thought it was just a costume party.

item.title: Putin’s ‘Peace’ Proposal Would Be a Prelude to More War
item.description: The Russian president is demanding a steep price for peace — on terms so favorable for Moscow that it would likely be a temporary reprieve.

item.title: Using Tax Incentives to Improve Our Economic Statistics
item.description: Higher participation rates, as well as more timely and accurate responses, are necessary to improve the performance of our economic surveys.

item.title: Wayfair CFO says sellers on the company’s $12 billion marketplace are trying to ‘insulate’ customers from tariffs
item.description: Wayfair has been on a rocky ride over the past five years.

item.title: IRS gives up after blowing $500K a year on broken self-serve kiosks

item.title: Trump Blasts Media’s ‘Dishonest’ Coverage Of Russia-Ukraine Negotiations
item.description: President Trump blasted the legacy media’s “great dishonesty” in their coverage of his attempts to peacefully end the ongoing Russia-Ukraine war. The ...

item.title: Trump doesn't rule out U.S. troops in Ukraine as a peacekeeping force

item.title: Changing Names Won’t Fix MSNBC’s Reputation As A Left-Wing Propaganda Machine

item.title: Sam Altman admits OpenAI ‘totally screwed up’ its GPT-5 launch and says the company will spend trillions of dollars on data centers
item.description: Altman also said that he thinks we’re in an AI “bubble.”

item.title: Canada’s Assisted Suicide Regime Is the West’s Cry for Help
item.description: Even mainstream secular outlets are noticing the horrors and abuse of legalized euthanasia.

item.title: Zelenskyy sports more formal attire for follow-up meeting at the White House
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Monday donned a more formal new look for his high-stakes White House meeting with President Trump.

item.title: The Ukraine War Was Always Going To End This Way
item.description: From the very beginning it was clear that Ukraine’s borders, a relic of Soviet propaganda, would have to change.

item.title: Duolingo CEO admits his controversial AI memo ‘did not give enough context’ and insists the company never laid off full-time employees
